resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/108179</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>108179</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206241</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology Resource Center</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie-Hilfsmittel-Mitte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Centre de ressource de la Science et de 
technologie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Centro do recurso da ciência e da tecnologia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Centro delle risorse di tecnologia e di scienza</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κέντρο των στοιχείων συμπεριφοράς επιστήμης και 
τεχνολογίας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Centro del recurso de la ciencia y de la 
tecnología</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">offers hundreds of annotated lessons, simulations, and resources for teaching topics in the physical sciences, including astronomy, classical mechanics, electricity and magnetism, fluid mechanics, general physics, modern physics, optics, oscillations and waves, quantum physics, and thermodynamics and statistical mechanics.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">bietet Hunderte der angemerkten Lektionen, der 
Simulationen und der Betriebsmittel für unterrichtende Themen in den 
körperlichen Wissenschaften, einschließlich Astronomie, klassische 
Mechaniker, Elektrizität und Magnetismus, flüssige Mechaniker, 
allgemeine Physik, moderne Physik, Optik, Pendelbewegungen und Wellen,
Quantumphysik und Thermodynamik- und statistischemechaniker an.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">offre des centaines de leçons, simulations, et 
ressources annotées pour des sujets d'enseignement en sciences 
physiques, y compris l'astronomie, mécanique classique, électricité
et magnétisme, mécanique liquide, physique générale, physique 
moderne, systeme optique, oscillations et vagues, physique de tranche 
de temps, et mécanique de thermodynamique et statistique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">oferece centenas de lições, simulações, e 
recursos anotados para tópicos ensinando nas ciências físicas, 
including a astronomia, mecanismo clássicos, eletricidade e 
magnetismo, os mecânicos fluidos, física geral, física moderna, 
sistema ótico, oscilações e ondas, física do quantum, e os 
mecânicos do thermodynamics e os estatísticos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">offre le centinaia delle lezioni, simulazioni e 
risorse annotate per i soggetti d'istruzione nelle scienze fisiche, 
compreso astronomia, meccanici classici, elettricità e magnetismo, 
meccanici fluidi, la fisica generale, la fisica moderna, ottica, 
oscillazioni ed onde, la fisica di quantum e meccanici statistici e di
termodinamica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">προσφέρει τις εκατοντάδες των σχολιασμένων μαθημάτων, 
των προσομοιώσεων, και των στοιχείων συμπεριφοράς για τα θέματα 
διδασκαλίας στις φυσικές επιστήμες, συμπεριλαμβανομένης της 
αστρονομίας, τους κλασσικούς μηχανικούς, την ηλεκτρική ενέργεια 
και το μαγνητισμό, τους ρευστούς μηχανικούς, τη γενική φυσική, τη
σύγχρονη φυσική, την οπτική, τις ταλαντώσεις και τα κύματα, την 
κβαντική φυσική, και το στατιστικού μηχανικό θερμοδυναμικής και.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ofrece centenares de lecciones, las simulaciones,
y los recursos anotados para los asuntos de enseñanza en las ciencias
físicas, incluyendo astronomía, los mecánicos clásicos, 
electricidad y magnetismo, los mecánicos flúidos, física general, 
física moderna, la óptica, las oscilaciones y las ondas, física del
quántum, y los mecánicos del termodinámica y estadísticos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206241</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>108179</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/science-and-technology-resource-center</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
